Package org.apache.commons.math4.ml.distance

Common distance measures.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DistanceMeasure
    Interface for distance measures of n-dimensional vectors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CanberraDistance
    Calculates the Canberra distance between two points.
    CanberraDistanceTest
    Tests for CanberraDistance class.
    ChebyshevDistance
    Calculates the L∞ (max of abs) distance between two points.
    ChebyshevDistanceTest
    Tests for ChebyshevDistance class.
    EarthMoversDistance
    Calculates the Earh Mover's distance (also known as Wasserstein metric) between two distributions.
    EarthMoversDistanceTest
    Tests for EarthMoversDistance class.
    EuclideanDistance
    Calculates the L2 (Euclidean) distance between two points.
    EuclideanDistanceTest
    Tests for EuclideanDistance class.
    ManhattanDistance
    Calculates the L1 (sum of abs) distance between two points.
    ManhattanDistanceTest
    Tests for ManhattanDistance class.

Package org.apache.commons.math4.ml.distance Description

Common distance measures.
